entries.title: Ebola Fast Facts - CNN.com
entries.contentSnippet:
4 days ago ... Ebola is a virus with a high fatality rate that was first identified in Africa in 1976.
Learn more facts about Ebola.

entries.title: Ebola-Stricken Surgeon Dr. Martin Salia Dies in Nebraska - ABC News
entries.contentSnippet:
3 hours ago ... Dr. Martin Salia, who contracted Ebola in Africa and was later flown to the United
States, has died, officials with Nebraska Medical Center said.
